This document contains the code needed to conduct our statistical and descriptive analyses.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
read_csv("../data_and_cleaning/covid_econ_data.csv") -> df
head(df)
```


```{r}
lm(average_deaths ~ estimate_number_commuting_to_work + 
     estimate_mean_earnings_usd + 
     estimate_health_insurance_coverage + estimate_percent_essential_workers,
   data = combined) -> lm1

summary(lm1)
plot(lm1)
```
